title: Metástasis
overview: A Spanish language adaption of the hit US show Breaking Bad.Walter Blanco is a frustrated professor of chemistry in an institute, the father of a disabled young man, Walter Blanco Jr., and with his pregnant wife, Cielo Blanco. Walter also works in a car wash in the afternoon. When he is diagnosed with terminal lung cancer, he considers what will happen to his family when he dies.In a raid by the Anti-narcotics Police organized by Walter's brother-in-law, Henry Navarro, he recognizes a former student of his, José Miguel Rosas, whom he contacts to manufacture and sell methamphetamine and thus ensure the economic well-being of his family. But the approach to the world of drugs and the dealings with traffickers and mafiosi contaminates the personality of Walter, who gradually abandons his straight and predictable personality to become someone without too many scruples when it comes to getting what he wants.
